Frequently Asked Questions

What is Futsal?

All About Futsal

Think, soccer on a basketball court. Have you ever seen a fenced b-ball court and thought - "Well, they sure need some goal post and a heavy soccer bal out here, something exciting."? That's why futsal was created. Having all the fun of the fastest-paced game with nothing needed but shoes and a ball!

Futsal is the fastest paced game in the world. Other than table-tennis, there's nothing more fast paced than a good game of futsal. Setting up and enjoying a game is not only exciting, but really tiring, the pros play 20-minute halfs

Futsal is for poor people and any weather condition. Originally made in Uruguay for youth soccer leagues to play in consistently rained-out fields, the game has shown itself a favorite of youth, teens, professionals, coaches and everyone in between.

About Futsal 101

We all love the game that much! This is simple. Futsal is loved by everyon, you just need a chance to get exposed to it.

Get a chance to play in the pro's? This is the most popular futsal tournament so winners receive a cash prize of 10BTC and a flight to the Futsal101 championship.
